mechanics: Gameplay is often synced to music
Not all levels sync to music
Players must avoid obstacles in one attempt

difficulty.insane: Real challenges, once the hardest difficulty
difficulty.medium demon: A step up from easy demon, often featuring tight gameplay
difficulty.hard demon: Gameplay with precises clicks, often needing days of practice
difficulty.insane demon: Extremely precise clicks pushing mechanics to the max
difficulty.extreme_demon: Precision is required, one mis-click can mean failure
difficulty.top 1: An unofficial difficulty featuring the hardest levels made, every click has to be perfect in these levels
difficulty.impossible: Levels that are impossible, these levels were uploaded to the servers using hacks and have never been beaten

community: Players can create and upload custom levels
Difficulty is voted on by the community
The demon list, or Pointercrate, is a list of demon levels ranked by how difficult they are
Extreme Demons are verified by top players

flipped_gravity_ship.description: Up until update 2.2, ship physics were different if the gravity was flipped, this is still present in levels made before update 2.2 and levels that enable legacy ship controls

hitboxes.description: Some of the game's hitboxes are extremely weird and unexpected, like the spike having only a single small rectangle at the tip of the spike.
